alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 1:31PM PST until December 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to three inches, with locally higher amounts on summits and passes. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Through 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
